tense,	lacking	in	confidence	or	
worried.
Becoming a parent for the 
first	time	can	feel	like	an	
overwhelming responsibility 
and it is very easy to feel 
inadequate when other 
parents around you seem to 
be coping well.
Give yourself plenty of time 
to adjust to your new life. Find 
time to rest and eat a healthy 
diet, as this will help you to 
become and stay physically 
and emotionally healthy.
Talk to someone you can 
trust such as your partner, 
your mum, a
